Posted By: Lateralis0ne (7/6/2010 12:14:12 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
defiantly worse than the original, but i think that thats the idea of all the magus's. Plus it save you money! The only thing with this guy is that he isn't legendary unlike the original tabernacle, so you can put more than one in play. Of corse, then you'l need cloud post level mana axell to keep them in play. And it says "sacrifice" rather than "destroy" so indestructibility wont save it, but that also means that you wont be able to abuse that fact yourself, and [Tajuru Preserver](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tajuru Preserver) can save there creatures. And dropping the tabernacle turn one was probably the most dangerous thing you could think of.  
  
All in all, i would say that (Without looking at the the obvious advantages and disadvantages of being a 2/6) it is worse, but not *strictly* worse than the original, putting it a step above most of the other maguses.
posts.html:

And dropping the tabernacle turn one was probably the most dangerous thing you could think of.

All in all, i would say that (Without looking at the the obvious advantages and disadvantages of being a 2/6) it is worse, but not strictly worse than the original, putting it a step above most of the other maguses.

Posted By: Sir_Kraemer (8/17/2012 11:33:35 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Love this card because:  
  
1. hinders the mana cost of spells played on both sides of the table ( goes pretty crazy with the rhystic cards or any card with "unless you pay \_\_\_" in it)  
  
2. Very tough stats for a 4 mana card, defends against a lot of things and gets rid of most tokens in combat  
  
3. The art is excellent, love the sand like colors on white cards, also the blue in the center of the card really stands out
posts.html:
Love this card because:

1. hinders the mana cost of spells played on both sides of the table ( goes pretty crazy with the rhystic cards or any card with "unless you pay ___" in it)

2. Very tough stats for a 4 mana card, defends against a lot of things and gets rid of most tokens in combat

3. The art is excellent, love the sand like colors on white cards, also the blue in the center of the card really stands out
